==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
Literally: "of one grain of rice" or "of one metre." A [[slang]] expression peculiar to Southern China, particularly [[Nanjing]].

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=de 一mǐ
|cat=post
}}

===Postposition===
{{zh-post}}

# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[really]]; [[extremely]]
#: {{zh-x|這 部 電影 好看 '''的.一米'''！|This movie is '''awesome'''!}}
#: {{zh-x|他 跑步 跑 得 搞笑 '''的.一米'''！|The way he runs is '''bloody''' hilarious!}}

===Usage notes===
Used as an [[intensifier]] at the end of an adjective.

===Synonyms===
* {{zh-l|的一比}}
